title: LAJAUDIO Mega Pack #1 Fun Casual Adventure Game Music
description: This Royalty Free Music Package includes 25 Music Tracks with cute casual vibes
longDescription:
Preview Youtube


☆Click Here For Preview☆


===================================


🚀NEW FEATURE🚀


You can now Purchase/Listen to an INDIVIDUAL track on my official website:


https://www.lajaudio.com/shop


==================================


You need music for your World Map, your Menus, or your Levels? You have a Snow World, a Desert World, a Sky World, or a Forest World in your game? This Mega Pack could save you from a few headaches and even give you the inspiration boost you need. Made with Cubase, dozens of VSTs, and pro audio equipment, these cute and fun music tracks will make players feel joyful emotions while they are jumping, running, and exploring the levels of your game. 


=======================================================================


♪This Mega Pack contains 25 music tracks including: 


  • Lajaudio Music Pack #3 (Contains a total of 13 Music Tracks)


+ 5 ingame themes, each representing their own world 

+ 5 World Map Music loops variants, for each world. 


♥ Hills World Music Theme (loopable) (+ 1 Worldmap Music Loop Hills Variant) 

♥ Snow World Music Theme (loopable) (+ 1 Worldmap Music Loop Snow Variant) 

♥ Forest World Music Theme (loopable) (+ 1 Worldmap Music Loop Forest Variant) 

♥ Egypt Desert World Theme (loopable) (+ 1 Worldmap Music Loop Egypt Variant) 

♥ Sky World Music Theme (loopable) (+ 1 Worldmap MusicLoop Sky Variant) 


+1 Cute Title Screen Music to welcome your players every time they play your game. 


***2 BONUS TRACKS!*** 

That's not all! How about a cool BOSS FIGHT music track? Or a fun memorable Credits Scene music for when players finish your game? I got you covered with these 2 bonus tracks! 


  • Lajaudio Music Pack #2 (Contains a total of 5 Music Tracks)


Includes 3 ingame themes, each representing their own world:


♥ Forest World Music Theme (loopable)

♦ Farwest Desert World Theme (loopable)

♠ Snow World Music Theme (loopable)


+1 fun bonus music loop that can fit perfectly as a leaderboard music, a menu music or even a bonus room music. 


+1 Cute Title Screen Music to welcome your players every time they play your game.


  • Lajaudio Extra


I added 7 Music Tracks coming from various dead-end projects that never saw the light of day. These soundtracks all have a special place in my heart, and I hope they'll find a place somewhere in your game.


In there you have:


+1 Mobile Runner Music in a Toy World,

+1 Puzzle Music,

+1 Select Screen Music

+2 Main Menu Music

+2 Ingame music perfect for platformers, puzzle games, and cute adventure games.


This is all Royalty Free, as long as you put Lajaudio in the credits.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All Loopable aside from Title1 which was meant to be played only once
  •  All Music Pack #2 and Music Pack #3 Tracks included (total 18 tracks)
  •  7 Extra Bonus Tracks Included
  • WAV Format Compatible with everything
  • Royalty-Free

Number of Audio Wavs: 25

Number of Audio Cues: 25

Sample rate: (44,100 Hz)

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: 23 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)
